traits.Blood Frenzy: The render has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Hold Breath: The render can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.Multiattack: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Rend the Field (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
